original_text: And when Moses saw that the people had broken loose (for Aaron had let them break loose, to the derision of their enemies),
korean_text: 모세가 본즉 백성이 방자하니 이는 아론이 그들을 방자하게 하여 원수에게 조롱거리가 되게 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: that the people had broken loose,
(for Aaron had let them break loose,
to the derision of their enemies),
